title: 2019 Shillong Premier League
text:
The 2019 Shillong Premier League was 10th season of <a href="Shillong%20Premier%20League">Shillong Premier League</a>, the top-tier <a href="association%20football">football</a> league in <a href="Shillong">Shillong</a>, a city in <a href="India">India</a>n state of <a href="Meghalaya">Meghalaya</a>. <a href="Langsning%20F.C.">Langsning F.C.</a> was defending champions. The league commenced from 20 August 2019. It was also known as "Officers Choices Blue Shillong Premier League" due to sponsorship reasons.
Format.
The 10th season of <a href="Shillong%20Premier%20League">Shillong Premier League</a> has been restructured. League will be played in regular format only, which means there will be no playoffs or final like previous seasons. Team finishing at the top of points table will be crowned champions. Bottom two teams will be relegated to <a href="2020%20shillong%20First%20Division">First Division</a>.
Standing.
